name: Trash Town Trouble
description:
Trash Town Trouble is a funny action cleaning Simulator

The Goal is to push the "Enemys" into the dustbin and clean the city from all rubbish.

How to Play? 

Use WASD to move

Use E to switch your weapon (Broom and Blowtool)

Use left mouseklick to use your weapon

Use spacebar to dash into people

TEAM

Suzan Azakli - 2D Art / Animation

Maximilian Götz - Programming

André Meyer - Programming

Lukas Schneller - Programming
